text:
Refugee organizations, those Habitat for Humanity stores, a local LGBTQ+ center, a local homeless shelter, AMVETS?

If the clothes are interesting enough, a local theater group for costumes?

I work at an org at operates a family homeless shelter & housing program - about 3-4x/year we do our own in-house clothing drives, but the best local resources are orgs that operate full-time clothing closets. Most decent sized cities have at least 1 or 2, that would be the ideal most direct use.
